name: Gods of Egypt: Deleted Storyboard Sequences
detailed_description: Viewers can access two scenes that were digitally storyboarded as animatics but not featured in the final film: Horus’s Coronation Party and Bek and The Phoenix.
about_the_game: Viewers can access two scenes that were digitally storyboarded as animatics but not featured in the final film: Horus’s Coronation Party and Bek and The Phoenix.
